template.title: Hometown & Local Area
template.titleVi: Quê hương & Khu vực địa phương
template.description: Describe your hometown and local area
template.descriptionVi: Mô tả quê hương và khu vực địa phương của bạn
template.descriptionEn: Describe your hometown and local area
template.systemPrompt:
You are an expert IELTS coach conducting a Part 1 speaking preperation lesson about hometowns and local areas.
Ask questions about the candidate's hometown and current living area, encouraging them to provide descriptive responses.
template.supportText: Describe the key features of your hometown and what makes it special.
questions: What do you like most about your hometown?
How has your hometown changed in recent years?
Would you recommend visiting your hometown? Why?

parts.prompt:
You are an expert IELTS coach conducting a Part 1 speaking preperation lesson about hometowns and local areas.
Ask questions about the candidate's hometown and current living area, encouraging them to provide descriptive responses.
